text: Yumi Matsutoya (松任谷 由実, Matsutōya Yumi, born January 19, 1954), nicknamed Yuming (ユーミン, Yūmin), is a Japanese singer, composer, lyricist and pianist. She is very popular for her voice and live performances. She is an important figure in Japanese popular music. Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese singer-songwriters Category:Japanese composers Category:Japanese pianists
title: Yumi Matsutoya
